news.title: Illegal construction still on in Aravalis, trees cut & walls built
news.para: This land is supposed to be protected as a natural conservation zone and both Punjab & Haryana high court and Supreme Court have clearly said no construction is allowed there. The affected site is part of Bandhwari village, which falls under the city's municipal area.

news.title: GMRL seeks land clearance to build 10 stations for new metro in Gurugram
news.para: The entire metro corridor will cover 28.5km and eventually connect Millennium City Centre to Cyber City with 27 stations, including the spur from Basai. The entire project is expected to cost Rs 5,452 crore.

news.title: Odisha RERA becomes defunct after only member retires
news.para: ORERA functions primarily with three senior members. Its chairperson, Siddhanta Das, resigned on Feb 28, just before completing his five-year term. On May 2, member (administration) Pradeep Biswal also retired.

news.title: Surge in prices of buliding materials hits construction industry in Coimbatore
news.para: The JAC alleged that quarry and crusher owners deliberately curtailed production to create artificial scarcity and drive-up prices. The committee urged authorities to restore the previous pricing structure.

news.title: Uttar Pradesh RERA warns builders not to hand over incomplete flats to buyers
news.para: The notice, issued on May 8, came in response to complaints from homebuyers, who allege that developers are forcing them to take possession of bare-shell units – which are often devoid of proper flooring, electrical fittings, plumbing and kitchen furnishings – while signing the builder-buyer agreements (BBA).

news.title: Karnataka government to distribute one lakh title deeds to mark its two years: Deputy CM
news.para: "As of now, it has been decided to give title deeds to one lakh people from the Revenue Department headed by Minister Krishna Byre Gowda. Preparations are on for it. The programme will be held in Vijayanagara district. May 20 is the date decided," Shivakumar said.

news.title: Give Goa relaxation for sand mining like Andaman islands: CM to Centre
news.para: Sawant said that the prohibition of sand extraction under these notifications adversely affected the availability of sand besides the livelihood of dependent families.

news.title: Gaya industrial smart city gets Centre’s green signal
news.para: Connected to the Eastern Dedicated Freight Corridor (EDFC), the project is designed to enhance regional industrial capacity and develop world-class infrastructure.

news.title: B L Kashyap & Sons secures ₹510 crore construction contract for Sky Palazzo Residences in Gurugram
news.para: B L Kashyap & Sons will develop a residential project - Sky Palazzo Residences, located in Sector 88B, Gurugram.

news.title: Once again, Chandigarh administration tries to digitise estate records
news.para: The National Informatics Centre (NIC) has been asked to initiate the process of full digitisation of the estate office records. At least three attempts were made by the estate office at digitising records in 2005, 2011, and 2021, but none could achieve full digitisation.

news.title: Pune's third metro line's operations to start in March 2026
news.para: "The concessionaire has put up the proposal for the deadline extension. It has to be tabled before the executive committee comprising the additional chief finance secretary for approval," a senior official of the Pune Metropolitan Region Development Authority (PMRDA) told TOI on Saturday.

news.title: SHRC orders probe into dust nuisance from M-sand sales centre in Kollam
news.para: The directive was issued by commission member V Geetha following a complaint lodged by local resident S Radhakrishnan, who claimed that unbearable dust levels from the facility made it impossible for him and his family to live.

news.title: Madurai civic body collects ₹54.91 crore property tax in April 2025
news.para: The 5% rebate offered to property owners who paid taxes before April 30, capped at ₹5,000 per taxpayer, is said to have boosted compliance. Officials said this was the highest-ever property tax collection in a single month in the civic body's history.

news.title: Uttar Pradesh introduces Bye-Law 2025 to simplify, increase transparency in property transfer taxes
news.para: Clear, defined fee structures based on property area (for legal heir/will transfers) or value (for other transfers) will provide predictability for citizens, according to a press statement.

news.title: Ludhiana civic body steps up efforts to recover pending property tax for ongoing fiscal
news.para: Notices are being served on the departments concerned for the recovery of the dues, and MC officials are also putting up pictures of the defaulting properties.

news.title: Mumbai Metro 3: BKC-Worli services to start from May 10, final phase to open in August
news.para: Fadnavis and deputy Chief Minister Eknath Shinde rode by a Metro train through the underground corridor from BKC to Siddhivinayak Temple on Friday afternoon.

news.title: BMC demolishes five illegal high-rises in Mumbai's Versova
news.para: The civic body stated that despite repeated notices from the municipal administration instructing the concerned parties to remove the constructions, no action was taken by them.

news.title: Pune: Residents oppose proposed town planning scheme for Chikhali & Charholi areas
news.para: The Pimpri Chinchwad Municipal Corporation (PCMC) plans to undertake planned development in the region, particularly in Kudalwadi and its surrounding areas, where it recently conducted a large-scale demolition drive targeting illegal scrap shops and industrial units.
